mapper.select: SELECT a.address_no, a.address_alias, a.address_name, a.address_tel, a.zone_code, a.road_add, a.detail_add, a.default_add FROM address a where a.user_no = #{user_no} order by a.default_add desc, a.address_no asc
SELECT address_no, address_alias, address_name, address_tel, zone_code, road_add, detail_add, default_add FROM address where user_no = #{user_no} AND address_no = #{address_no}
SELECT address_no, address_alias, address_name, address_tel, zone_code, road_add, detail_add, default_add FROM address where user_no = #{user_no} AND default_add = #{default_add}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO address(address_no, user_no, address_alias, address_name, address_tel, zone_code, road_add, detail_add, default_add )
VALUES ((select nvl(max(address_no), 0) + 1 from address), #{user_no}, #{address_alias}, #{address_name}, #{address_tel}, #{zone_code}, #{road_add}, #{detail_add}, #{default_add} )
mapper.update: UPDATE address SET address_alias = #{address_alias}, address_name = #{address_name}, address_tel = #{address_tel}, zone_code = #{zone_code}, road_add = #{road_add}, detail_add = #{detail_add} WHERE address_no = #{address_no} AND user_no = #{user_no}
